Resizable
=========


JavaScript
----------

.. js:function:: Plugins.fn.resizable(resize_class, click_spacing)

   Makes the current element resizable

   :param string resize_class: Class applied to the current element during the resizing process.

   :param number click_spacing: The area inside the borders of the element which can be
                                clicked to start the resizing process (in px).

   :returns: An object providing enable and disable functions.
